Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Meow \Me*ow"\, v. i. & n. See 6th and 7th {Mew}. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mew \Mew\, v. i. [Of imitative origin; cf. G. miauen.] To cry as a cat. [Written also {meaw}, {meow}.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]
meow n : the sound made by a cat (or any sound resembling this) [syn: {mew}, {miaou}, {miaow}] v : cry like a cat; "the cat meowed" [syn: {mew}]
